name: PracticalMachineLearning
tagline: Course Project for JHU Practical Machine Learning Coursera Class
body:
### Prediction Assignment Writeup
The assignment for this project is to implement a machine learning for the following data set:

Velloso, E.; Bulling, A.; Gellersen, H.; Ugulino, W.; Fuks, H. [Qualitative Activity Recognition of Weight Lifting Exercises.](http://groupware.les.inf.puc-rio.br/work.jsf?p1=11201) Proceedings of 4th International Conference in Cooperation with SIGCHI (Augmented Human '13) . Stuttgart, Germany: ACM SIGCHI, 2013.

[Groupware@ LES Projects - Human Activity Recognition](http://groupware.les.inf.puc-rio.br/har)

that predicts the type of bar bell weight lifting exercise an individual performed out of five possible classes.

### Authors and Contributors
The author for this project is @datasciencespm.
